title: GitHub security advisory (AV26-003)
description: On January 6, 2026, GitHub published security advisories to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.19.x prior to 3.19.1
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.18.x prior to 3.18.4
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.17.x prior to 3.17.10
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.16.x prior to 3.16.13
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.15.x prior to 3.15.17
GitHub Enterprise Server  versions 3.14.x prior to 3.14.22
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
